solution_line_template: Einstein collected {num_pizza_boxes} x ${price_per_pizza_box} = $<<{num_pizza_boxes}*{price_per_pizza_box}={pizza_revenue}>>{pizza_revenue} for selling pizzas.
He collected {num_fries_packs} x ${price_per_fries_pack} = $<<{num_fries_packs}*{price_per_fries_pack}={fries_revenue}>>{fries_revenue} for the {num_fries_packs} packs of potato fries.
He collected {num_soda_cans} x ${price_per_soda_can} = $<<{num_soda_cans}*{price_per_soda_can}={soda_revenue}>>{soda_revenue} for the {num_soda_cans} cans of soda.

Thus, the total amount section Einstein collected was ${pizza_revenue} + ${fries_revenue} +${soda_revenue} = $<<{pizza_revenue}+{fries_revenue}+{soda_revenue}={total_collected_amount}>>{total_collected_amount}.
Therefore, Einstein needs ${fundraising_goal} - ${total_collected_amount} = $<<{fundraising_goal}-{total_collected_amount}={money_needed}>>{money_needed} more to reach the goal.
